A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film did alot well. I thought that the good parts of the film compensated for the bad/pointless parts. It wasn't a perfect film but I enjoyed it\, which is what should happen. Could have cut out alot though. It felt like 2 different films seletaped together untill the very end so the pacing was off. Finn and rose felt pointless but Luke/Ray/Kylo were awsome
